context_of_use: The system allows users and customers to access and manage reports for review and offline analysis.
stakeholders_and_interests: customers who need to analyze reports
users who require access to reports for data analysis
description: Allow users and customers to view and download reports for review and offline analysis.
triggering_event: User or customer requests to view or download a report.
preconditions: User or customer must be logged into the system.
User or customer must have the necessary permissions to access reports.
postconditions: User or customer successfully views the report.
User or customer successfully downloads the report.
assumptions: Users and customers have access to the necessary reports.
The system has reports available for viewing and downloading.
requirements_met: The system must allow users and customers to view reports.
The system must allow users and customers to download reports.
main_flow: 1. Customer or user requests to view a report → System displays the report.
2. Customer or user selects the option to download the report → System initiates the download process.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If the report is not available, the system displays an error message.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the download fails, the system notifies the user or customer of the failure.
information_for_steps: 2. Download link or file for the report.
